relation: The name of a Data form field
Topic where form data is located. May be of the form Web.TopicName

Format string. $value expands to the field value, and $name expands to the field name, $title to the field title, $form to the name of the form the field is in. The standard format tokens are also expanded.
Text shown if the field is defined in the topic, but the field value is empty. For example, a text field for which all the content has been deleted.

Text shown if the field is not defined in the topic (even if it is specified in the form definition). For example, this is used when a field exists in the form definition, but the referring topic hasn't been edited since it was added.
Specifiy a revision of the topic. If not specified, defaults to the most recent rev (or the viewed rev if viewing an old rev of the same topic)
textBeforeTable: The following standard attributes are recognized A %COMMENT% without parameters shows a simple text box. COMMENT{ attributes } -- insert an edit box into the topic to easily add comments. Related: BR, BULLET, BB, BB2, BB3, BB4, VBAR Current value: CARET = ^ The CARET macro is useful in TML tables. CARET -- caret symbol Related: IF, SpreadSheetPlugin %CALC{"$UPPER(Collaboration)"}% returns COLLABORATION %CALC{"$EXISTS(Web.SomeTopic)"}% returns 1 if the topic exists %CALC{"$SUM($ABOVE())"}% returns the sum of all cells above the current cell Examples: Syntax: %CALC{"formula"}% The %CALC{"formula"}% macro is handled by the SpreadSheetPlugin. There are around 90 formulae, such as $ABS(), $EXACT(), $EXISTS(), $GET()/$SET(), $IF(), $LOG(), $LOWER(), $PERCENTILE(), $TIME(), $VALUE(). CALC{"formula"} -- add spreadsheet calculations to tables and outside tables Related: JQueryButton Note: BUTTONS are floating to the left by default. Take care to add a %CLEAR% after the %BUTTON{...}% so that further content does not overlap with the button. Cancel Submit Expands as: }% %CLEAR% target="%WEB%.%TOPIC%" icon="cross" "%MAKETEXT{"Cancel"}%" %BUTTON{ }%
textAfterTable: noform Set to "on" to disable the automatic form that encloses your comment block - remember to insert <form> tags yourself! See CommentPluginExamples:noform for an example. off nopost Set to "on" to disable insertion of the posted text into the topic. off remove Set to "on" to remove the comment prompt after the first time it is clicked. off button Button label text Add comment See CommentPlugin for more information COVER -- current skin cover %COVER% extends the skin search path. For instance, if SKIN is set to catskin, bearskin, and COVER is set to ruskin, the skin search path becomes ruskin, catskin, bearskin. The COVER setting can be overridden using the URL parameter cover, such as ?cover=ruskin Syntax: %COVER% Expands to: %COVER% See Skins for more information DATE -- signature format date Syntax: %DATE% Expands to: 03 Aug 2015 Date format
